text: 1.15-16 Wkp 11.44-45, 19.2, 20.7, Mat 5.48, 2 Ko 7.1, Hib 12.14, 2 Pi 3.11 Buk Baybol ak tɨkɨl anɨb agak, Yad gach sek ma mɨdɨl, suŋtep yɨbɨl mɨdebin, anɨb ak tek nɨbi gach sek ma mɨdɨl suŋtep yɨbɨl yenɨmɨb agɨl tɨkak. God nɨbop suk agɨl agak ak, ne gach sek ma mɨdɨl suŋtep yɨbɨl mɨdeb. Anɨb ak tek nɨbi abe, tɨtay gɨnɨg gɨnɨmɨb ak, gach sek ma mɨdɨl suŋtep yɨbɨl mɨdɨl, agup tek gɨnɨmɨb.
